A H O S 

A

addQualifiers(Set<Annotation>) - Method in class org.microbean.helidon.webserver.cdi.HelidonWebServerExtension
Adds the supplied Set of qualifier annotations to this HelidonWebServerExtension so that any synthetic beans it adds will take these qualifiers into account.

H

HelidonWebServerExtension - Class in org.microbean.helidon.webserver.cdi
A CDI portable extension that integrates Config, Config.Builder, WebServer, WebServer.Builder, Routing, Routing.Builder, ServerConfiguration, and ServerConfiguration.Builder instances into a CDI application.
HelidonWebServerExtension() - Constructor for class org.microbean.helidon.webserver.cdi.HelidonWebServerExtension
Creates a new HelidonWebServerExtension.

O

org.microbean.helidon.webserver.cdi - package org.microbean.helidon.webserver.cdi
Provides classes and interfaces that integrate the Helidon WebServer into CDI environments.

S

shutDown() - Method in class org.microbean.helidon.webserver.cdi.HelidonWebServerExtension
A brute force method that shuts down all WebServer instances that have been started by this HelidonWebServerExtension.
